title: A Moment Between U & I - exhibition at studio tuin en wereld
abstract:
Our world is full of distinctions.
Between inside and outside. Between the individual and the collective. Between here and there. Between U and I. When you cross this distinction there is a moment when that distinction becomes a thing on its own. That singular, unique moment is considered in this exposition.

The models featured in this expo are a reflection on our contemporary way of spatially organising of distinctions and reacting to them. ‘A Moment Between U and I’ Investigates explores and expresses the ‘moment’ when a private sphere comes in to contact with a public realm.

‘A Moment Between U an I’ as an exhibition is mounted in this specific interval place, as part of an historical shop window. The space itself represents a distinction and works as a space of distinction. By hosting this series of models in this micro gallery we hope to contribute to ‘A Moment Between U and I’.
historic_collection: Architecture, Campuses Sint-Lucas Brussels and Ghent;52409131
